name: relatable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related, or able to be related to something else: The market value of your property investment is directly relatable to the amount of work, effort and expertise you put into it.
that someone can understand or feel sympathy for: One of the reasons for her success is that the characters in her books are so relatable.
